title: The Green Guardian: The Tale of Pit Bryant
summary: Pit Bryant, a 39-year-old gardening enthusiast with a passion for mentoring, discovers his latent ability to manipulate plant life, which he uses to combat a looming environmental disaster in his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Pit Bryant, ein 39-jähriger Gartenliebhaber mit einer Leidenschaft für Mentoring, entdeckt seine latente Fähigkeit, Pflanzenleben zu manipulieren, die er verwendet, um eine drohende Umweltkatastrophe in seiner Stadt im Laufe einer Woche zu bekämpfen.
summaryDutch: Pit Bryant, een 39-jarige tuinierliefhebber met een passie voor mentoring, ontdekt zijn latente vermogen om plantenleven te manipuleren, wat hij gebruikt om een naderende milieuramp in zijn stad gedurende een week te bestrijden.
summaryFrench: Pit Bryant, un passionné de jardinage âgé de 39 ans avec une passion pour le mentorat, découvre sa capacité latente à manipuler la vie des plantes, qu'il utilise pour combattre une catastrophe environnementale imminente dans sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Pit Bryant starts his week as usual, tending to his community garden. Unbeknownst to him, a mysterious glowing seed falls into his bag, radiating an eerie energy.
The following day, as Pit interacts with his mentees, he notices the plants responding to his emotions, thriving with joy as he teaches.
Midweek, a developer announces plans to replace the community garden with a shopping mall. Pit feels a deep connection with the garden and vows to protect it.
Pit discovers his new abilities fully: he can accelerate growth and restore withered plants. He begins experimenting, feeling both triumphant and responsible for his powers.
The community rallies around Pit as he uses his powers to impress and inspire, turning the garden into a symbol of natural beauty and resistance against the developer.
Pit orchestrates a large-scale demonstration by transforming the garden overnight into a lush jungle, showcasing the environmental importance of green spaces.
The developer capitulates due to public pressure, leaving the garden untouched. Pit, feeling peaceful, commits to using his powers for good, mentoring young environmentalists.

ending: As the sun set on a victorious Sunday, Pit Bryant stood in his garden, the green leaves whispering tales of a silent guardian.
moral: The Earth blossoms under the gentle hands of those who care for it.
